DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of remote ischemic preconditioning on exercise capacity in patients with heart failure.
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study of Remote Ischemic Preconditioning in Heart Failure
DOC.criteria: LV ejection fraction <40% NYHA functional class IIIV Non ischemic cardiomyopathy Stable recent cardiovascular hospitalization (within last 4 weeks) ischemic cardiomyopathy diabetes mellitus peripheral neuropathy ventricular assist device contraindications to exercise stress testing
